bilingual.source: I read the daily newspaper every morning.
bilingual.target: 我每天早上阅读每日的报纸。
每日的例行工作包括检查电子邮件。

bilingual.source: She takes her daily vitamins with breakfast.
bilingual.target: 她在早餐时服用每日的维生素。

bilingual.source: The tracker helps you monitor your daily steps.
bilingual.target: 这个追踪器帮助你监测每日的步数。

bilingual.source: She seeks tranquility in her daily yoga practice.
bilingual.target: 她在每日的瑜伽练习中寻找宁静。

bilingual.source: We use a water board to display the daily specials.
bilingual.target: 我们用水牌来展示每日的推荐菜。

bilingual.source: The app helps you track your daily cal consumption.
bilingual.target: 这个应用帮助你追踪每日的卡路里消耗。

bilingual.source: She finds peacefulness in her daily meditation practice.
bilingual.target: 她在每日的冥想练习中找到了平静。

bilingual.source: The nurse is dispensing the daily vitamins to the children.
bilingual.target: 护士正在给孩子们分发每日的维生素。

bilingual.source: He monitored his daily ingestion of calories to maintain his weight.
bilingual.target: 他监控自己每日的卡路里摄入以保持体重。

list.abstract: daily是由南京依维柯打造的一辆多功能商车，是现款Power Daily的改款车型，该车于2017年4月20日在上海国际车展上亮相，2017年7月7日正式下线，车型分客车和货车两个版本。客车版本配置了铝合金轮毂，更加时尚动感；货车版本采用成本更低的银色钢轮毂。

yingyinNormal.en: So here is what happened in daily life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下面是日常生活中发生的。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Wayne? Mr. Wayne? Clark Kent, Daily Planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 韦恩先生？我是《星球日报》的克拉克·肯特。

yingyinNormal.en: I was editor in chief of the Daily Northwestern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我曾是西北日报的主编。

yingyinNormal.en: And then things would get brutal. Daily, daily events. Fending off attacks. Launching my own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那可就是真刀真枪了，每天都非常激烈防御对手的进攻，同时进攻对手。

yingyinNormal.en: Daily Planet. Do I own this one? Or is that the other guy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 《星球日报》，是我的吗？还是别人的？

yingyinNormal.en: And then they tug the bandage off. That was kind of a daily torture.
yingyinNormal.zh: (清洗伤口)需把绷带拆下，这是日复一日的折磨。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, she is female. Yes, we communicate on a daily basis, but no, she is not my girlfriend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，她是女性，没错，我们每天交流，但是，她不是我女朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Meaning after 3 days of the recommended daily water intake, you'd have burned off that 200 calories.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也就是说，三天后，就可以燃烧那200卡路里。

yingyinNormal.en: You do like carrots, don't you, Rebecca? Yes. All those are excellent things to show our daily lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的很喜欢萝卜，对吧瑞贝卡？是的。这些都是非常能展现我们日常生活的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Make way there, please. Let me by, madam. Thank you. Excuse me, little girl. This is for the Daily Prophet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麻烦请让一让。太太，借过一下，谢谢。不好意思，小朋友。这是为预言家日报拍的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: The Daily Planet criticizing those who think they're above the law is a little hypocritical, wouldn't you say?
yingyinNormal.zh: 《星球日报》批判那些认为自己凌驾于法律之上的人，你不觉得有点虚伪吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We might not always know it. We may not always see it or hear it on the news, or even feel it in our daily lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我们并非总能意识到这一点，或许并非经常在新闻中看到或听到这样的事，或是在日常生活中亲身感受过。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, their speed causes the atomic clocks on board to disagree with clocks on the ground by seven millionths of a second daily.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，GPS卫星的行驶速度导致飞行着的原子钟与地上的原子钟之间产生每天7百万分之一秒之差。

yingyinNormal.en: Principal Brown! Leslie Kwan Collins from The Daily Dolphin. Yeah. I know who you are, Leslie. Must we do this dance every single time?
yingyinNormal.zh: 布朗校长！我是《每日海豚报》的莱斯丽·关·柯林斯。我知道你是谁，莱斯丽。我们每次都要来一遍吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But scientists have estimated that sauropods ate about 1,500kg of hay every day. In other words, about 20 times that daily diet. Or 50 bales of hay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但科学家经过估算后发现蜥脚龙每天大约能吃掉1.5吨草料。换句话说 相当于大象的二十倍，或者是50捆干草。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm truly sorry for your loss. But you mustn't keep coming here on a daily basis. It doesn't help, and diverts time and resources from our investigation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对您的遭遇，我深表同情。但您不能每天来我们这儿。您来这儿没有用，只会分散我们的注意力，影响我们调查。

yingyinNormal.en: Starting this week, these travelers will be required to report their temperatures and any symptoms on a daily basis, for 21 days until we're confident they don't have Ebola.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从本周开始，这些旅客将被要求每天都报告他们的体温和出现的任何症状，并持续21天，直到我们有信心他们没有携带埃博拉病毒。

yingyinNormal.en: Moreover, when updating impressions based on people's behaviors, activity in the ventrolateral prefrontal cortex and the superior temporal sulcus correlates with perceptions of how frequently those behaviors occur in daily life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 此外，更新印象的时候，若是以行为做基础，在腹侧前额叶皮质区以及上侧颞叶沟的活动和我们所认为那些行为在生活中出现的频率有关。

yingyinNormal.en: When young Harry stepped into Flourish and Blotts this morning to purchase my autobiography, Magical Me, which incidentally, is currently celebrating its 27th week atop the Daily Prophet bestseller list, he had no idea that he would, in fact, believing with my entire collected works free of charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈利·波特今天早上特地踏进了华丽与污痕书店来购买我的自传《神奇的我》，顺便提一下这本书最近刚好登上预言家日报畅销书排行榜的第27周榜首，哈利绝对不会想到，他也不会相信，他将会得到我的全套著作，完全免费。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Why should a car-driving pensioner from Lincolnshire have to subsidise the <highlight>daily</highlight> commute of a stockbroker from Surrey?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么一个来自林肯郡的退休司机要为来自萨里郡的股票经纪人的日常通勤提供补贴呢?

examination_example.sentence: While the researchers assumed that the well-structured <highlight>daily</highlight> plans would be most effective, they were wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管研究人员认为安排合理的每日计划十分有效，但他们却错了。

examination_example.sentence: It allows us to see the beauty that surrounds us in nature, in culture, in the flow of our <highlight>daily</highlight> lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让我们看到我们周围大自然中的，文化中的，日常生活中的美。

examination_example.sentence: I also found that weighing myself <highlight>daily</highlight> did not provide an accurate depiction of the hard work and progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还发现，每天称体重并不能准确体现我的努力和进步。

examination_example.sentence: Harford argues that inevitable distractions often render the <highlight>daily</highlight> to-do list ineffective.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哈福德认为，不可避免的干扰往往会致使每日的待办事项清单无效。

examination_example.sentence: It's a good idea to shop <highlight>daily</highlight> instead of weekly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天购物而不是每周购物是个好主意。

examination_example.sentence: Most Americans rely on social media to check <highlight>daily</highlight> headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数美国人依靠社交媒体查看每日头条新闻。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_usage.usage: daily作形容词，只用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：a daily routine 日常工作。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 日常基础；每日基础；每天

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴
adj. 每日的；每周日的；一天的
n. 日光；知觉；神智；破晓；距离；天明；晨曦；空隙

word_family.mean: n. 一天；时期；时代；（Day）人名：戴

examination_example.sentence: In many circumstances, social connection is actually more helpful to your <highlight>daily</highlight> life than understanding the truth of a particular fact or idea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多情况下，社会联系实际上比了解特定事实或想法的真相更有助于你的日常生活。

examination_example.sentence: On many occasions in <highlight>daily</highlight> life, people benefit more from their social bonds than from knowing the truth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在日常生活中的许多场合，人们从他们的社会关系中获益比从了解真相中获益更多。

examination_example.sentence: The lack of adequate maintenance and <highlight>daily</highlight> attention to such a majestic building is the cause of this catastrophe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对如此宏伟的建筑缺乏足够的维护和日常关注是造成这场灾难的原因。

examination_example.sentence: The Himayalan kingdom of Bhutan has a longstanding policy of charging visitors a <highlight>daily</highlight> fee.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不丹的喜马拉雅王国长期以来都有向游客收取每日费用的政策。

word_usage.usage:
daily在句中只能用作定语，无比较级或最高级形式。
示例：Daily practice is the trick in learning a foreign language.
每天练习是学会一门外语的诀窍。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 特指每天发生一次的, 也可指按日计的。
一般日常用词, 指日常发生的、无须特别关心的。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 日常工作；日常例行；每日常规

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴
adj. 每日的；每周日的；一天的
n. 日光；知觉；神智；破晓；距离；天明；晨曦；空隙

word_family.mean: n. 一天；时期；时代；（Day）人名：戴

examination_example.sentence: It delivered her <highlight>daily</highlight> necessities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它运送她的日常必需品。

examination_example.sentence: It will make a difference in people's <highlight>daily</highlight> lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它将改变人们的日常生活。

examination_example.sentence: Their <highlight>daily</highlight> routine followed the rhythm of the natural cycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的日常生活遵循自然循环的规律。

examination_example.sentence: "I think we're unique as a federal agency," USPS official Mike Swig art told me, "be use we're in literally every community in this country.... We're obligated to deliver to that point on a <highlight>daily</highlight> basis."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政局官员迈克·斯威特跟我这么说：“我认为我们作为一个联邦机构是独一无二的，因为我们几乎忙活在国家的每一个社区里...我们有义务每天都做到这一点。”

examination_example.sentence: A recent investigation into the sugar content of' adult' breakfast cereals found that some cereals contain more than three-quarters of the recommended <highlight>daily</highlight> amount of free sugars in each portion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一项对成人早餐麦片含糖量的调查发现，一些早餐谷物片中，每份所含游离糖达到每日推荐摄入量的四分之三。

examination_example.sentence: Professor Godel already had eight teaching assistants, but that wasn't enough to deal with the overwhelming number of <highlight>daily</highlight> questions from students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈德尔教授已经有了八名助教，但这还不足以应付学生们每天提出的大量问题。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers argued that breakfast helps reduce <highlight>daily</highlight> calorie intake and improve the quality of our diet — since breakfast foods are often higher in fibre and nutrients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，早餐有助于减少每日卡路里的摄入量，改善我们的饮食质量，因为早餐吃的东西往往含有更高的纤维含量和营养成分。

examination_example.sentence: A commentary in the Shanghai <highlight>Daily</highlight> points out that innovation doesn't mean piles of documents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《上海日报》的一篇评论指出，创新并不意味着成堆的文件。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: It may increase <highlight>daily</highlight> expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可能会增加日常开销。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Daily</highlight> life provides ideas for creative writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日常生活为创造性写作提供了思路。

examination_example.sentence: His students are emailing <highlight>daily</highlight> with NASA engineers about the problem, readying a workable solution to test in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的学生每天都给美国宇航局的工程师发邮件，讨论这个问题，准备在太空中进行测试的可行方案。

examination_example.sentence: "I often send postcards to family and friends," he says to China <highlight>Daily</highlight>.

每日计划；日常日程；日常安排

examination_example.sentence: Balanced diets are just as important as regular exercise in our <highlight>daily</highlight> life．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们的日常生活中，均衡的饮食和有规律的锻炼一样重要。

examination_example.sentence: As we all know, cooperation is of great importance in our <highlight>daily</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知，合作在我们的日常生活中非常重要。

examination_example.sentence: When I grow into a teenager, I always met some difficulties in my <highlight>daily</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我成为一名青少年时，我总是在我的日常生活中遇到一些困难。

examination_example.sentence: How long does Liverpool Museum run <highlight>daily</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利物浦博物馆每天运行多长时间？

examination_example.sentence: Homework is a <highlight>daily</highlight> occurrence for most students, one that can take three to four hours per night．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对大多数学生来说，家庭作业是每天都要做的事，每晚可能要花三到四个小时。

examination_example.sentence: Lydia runs four or five (五) times a week and takes a <highlight>daily</highlight> walk with her two dogs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莉迪亚一周跑四五次，每天和她的两只狗一起散步。

sense_info_list.en: a newspaper published every day except Sunday

examination_example.sentence: It has helped to plant more than 66 billion trees across 13 provinces in the country, according to China <highlight>Daily</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据《中国日报》报道，它已经帮助全国13个省份种植了660多亿棵树。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_usage.usage:
daily在句中只能用作定语，无比较级或最高级形式。
示例：Daily practice is the trick in learning a foreign language.
每天练习是学会一门外语的诀窍。
